ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."

ayahs.text: قَالَ يَٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ
ayahs.translation: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner,

ayahs.text: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
ayahs.translation: [Saying], 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me.

ayahs.text: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.translation: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allah, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew.' "

ayahs.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًۭا وَنَهَارًۭا
ayahs.translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.

ayahs.text: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًۭا
ayahs.translation: But my invitation increased them not except in flight.

ayahs.text: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًۭا
ayahs.translation: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًۭا
ayahs.translation: Then I invited them publicly.

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًۭا
ayahs.translation: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

ayahs.text: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًۭا
ayahs.translation: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.

ayahs.text: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًۭا
ayahs.translation: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

ayahs.text: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍۢ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَٰرًۭا
ayahs.translation: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.

ayahs.text: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًۭا
ayahs.translation: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur

ayahs.text: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
ayahs.translation: While He has created you in stages?

ayahs.text: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٍۢ طِبَاقًۭا
ayahs.translation: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers

ayahs.text: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًۭا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًۭا
ayahs.translation: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?

ayahs.text: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًۭا
ayahs.translation: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًۭا
ayahs.translation: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.

ayahs.text: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًۭا
ayahs.translation: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse

ayahs.text: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًۭا فِجَاجًۭا
ayahs.translation: That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "

ayahs.text: قَالَ نُوحٌۭ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًۭا
ayahs.translation: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.

ayahs.text: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًۭا كُبَّارًۭا
ayahs.translation: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.

ayahs.text: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّۭا وَلَا سُوَاعًۭا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًۭا
ayahs.translation: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.

ayahs.text: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًۭا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلًۭا
ayahs.translation: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."

ayahs.text: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًۭا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًۭا
ayahs.translation: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.

ayahs.text: وَقَالَ نُوحٌۭ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
ayahs.translation: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.

ayahs.text: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًۭا كَفَّارًۭا
ayahs.translation: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.

ayahs.text: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًۭا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا
ayahs.translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."
